description: Handy image viewer for convenient viewing and comparing - PyQt5 based
notes: HandyView is a handy image viewer for convenient viewing and comparing.
Features: Fixed zoom ratio switching, comparison modes, image info display,
mouse cursor position and color, rectangle drawing capabilities.
Set HandyView as default image viewer for best experience.
Shortcut keys: Space/Enter (next), Backspace (previous), Z (auto zoom), etc.
